lines.line: Hello!
Welcome back friend!
How goes your fight with the trolls?
I'm afraid I have bad news. We made our attack as planned, but we met unexpected resistance.
What happened?
We were ambushed by trolls coming from the north. They captured Dunstan's son, Godric, who we enlisted at your request; we tried to follow but we were repelled at the foot of their stronghold.
Is there anything I can do to help?
The way to the stronghold is treacherous, friend. Even if you manage to climb your way up, there will be many trolls defending the stronghold.
I'll get Godric back!
God speed friend! I would send some of my men with you, but none of them are brave enough to follow.
I'm sorry to hear that.
How are you getting on with rescuing Godric?
I haven't found a way to climb up yet.
Hurry, friend! Who knows what they'll do with Godric?
Hello Tenzing!
Hello again traveller. What can I do for you?
Sure, I'll sell you some in your size for 12 gold.
OK, sounds good.
Was there anything else?
I don't have the money on me.
No, thanks.
No human pass through arena without defeating Dad!
What tiny human do in troll arena? Dad challenge human to fight!
Troll named after first thing try to eat!
I accept your challenge!
Tiny human brave. Dad squish!
Eek! No thanks.
Coward. Dad wait for braver fighter.
Stop! You win. Not hurt Dad.
I'll be going now.
I'm not done yet! Prepare to die!
I've found my way into the prison.
...and?
That's all.
Hurry, friend. Find a way to free Godric!
Thanks! I'm off back home!
Thank you, my friend.
I have freed Godric!
Oh, what great news! You should hurry to tell Dunstan, he will be overjoyed!
Has Godric returned home?
He is safe and sound, thanks to you my friend!
I'm glad to hear it.
I have very little to offer you in way of thanks, but perhaps you will accept this family heirloom. It was found by my great-great-grandfather, but we still don't have any idea what it does.

characters.name: Dad
characters.description: Deep, booming male voice with a slow, dim-witted tone. Speaks in broken third-person grammar like a brutish troll. Intimidating but not very intelligent.

characters.name: Denulth
characters.description: Middle-aged male, British accent, authoritative and commanding tone. A seasoned military commander who speaks with urgency and concern for his soldiers.

characters.name: Dunstan
characters.description: Middle-aged male, British accent, warm and grateful tone. A hardworking blacksmith and devoted father, humble and appreciative.

characters.name: Eadgar
characters.description: Elderly male, slightly raspy voice with an eccentric, whimsical tone. A mad hermit who lives alone on a mountain, cheerful despite his strange circumstances.

characters.name: Godric
characters.description: Young adult male, British accent, earnest and relieved tone. A soldier recently rescued from captivity, grateful and sincere.

characters.name: Tenzing
characters.description: Middle-aged male, Tibetan or Nepalese accent, calm and practical tone. An experienced mountain sherpa, professional and matter-of-fact.
